properties.name: cloudant.username
properties.description: Cloudant username, for use with "couchdb_session" or "basic" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.password
properties.description: Cloudant password, for use with "couchdb_session" or "basic" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.bearer.token
properties.description: Cloudant bearer token, for use with "bearerToken" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.iam.profile.id
properties.description: Cloudant IAM profile ID, for use with "container" or "vpc" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.iam.profile.name
properties.description: Cloudant IAM profile name, for use with "container" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.cr.token.filename
properties.description: Cloudant CR token filename, for use with "container" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.iam.profile.crn
properties.description: Cloudant IAM profile CRN, for use with "vpc" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.auth.url
properties.description: Cloudant auth URL, for use with "iam", "container", or "vpc" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.scope
properties.description: Cloudant scope, for use with "iam", "container", or "vpc" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.client.id
properties.description: Cloudant client ID, for use with "iam", "container", or "vpc" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.client.secret
properties.description: Cloudant client secret, for use with "iam", "container", or "vpc" authentication.

properties.name: cloudant.apikey
properties.description: Cloudant database IAM API key, for use with "iam" authentication.
